title: Cameron Bailey (rugby union)
text:
Cameron Bailey (born 21 January 1996 in <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>) is a <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for <a href="Canterbury%20%28National%20Provincial%20Championship%29">Canterbury</a>. His playing position is <a href="Wing%20%28rugby%20union%29">wing</a> or <a href="Fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>. He was announced in the <a href="Canterbury%20%28National%20Provincial%20Championship%29">Canterbury</a> squad for the 2021 season.
At junior level, Bailey also represented New Zealand at <a href="Australian%20rules%20football">Australian rules football</a> and <a href="bowls">bowls</a>.
